_header: Ye wommen o wit harken all
_description: Praise of female brewers — two couplets

CULMm441.Transcription:
Ȝe wymmen o wyt herkeneþ alle[sum] y writ þu
                    makeþ Gode aledoer michel oþe seleAn [ ] þe bec an haue
                    [ ]
CULMm441.Note:
Added to lower margin, some damage from damp with loss of text; main
                    text here is Latin instructions to parish priests.
